001package edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model;
002
003import androidx.room.Embedded;
004import androidx.room.Relation;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.entity.Student;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.entity.ZoomMeeting;
007import java.time.Duration;
008import java.time.Instant;
009import java.time.LocalDateTime;
010import java.time.OffsetDateTime;
011import java.time.ZoneId;
012import java.time.ZoneOffset;
013import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
014import java.time.temporal.ChronoField;
015import java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit;
016import java.time.temporal.TemporalAdjuster;
017import java.util.AbstractMap;
018import java.util.List;
019import java.util.Map;
020import java.util.SortedMap;
021import java.util.TreeMap;
022import java.util.stream.IntStream;
023
024public class AttendanceAggregate {
025
026  private static final TemporalAdjuster HOUR_ADJUSTER = (temporal) -> ChronoField.MINUTE_OF_HOUR.adjustInto(ChronoField.SECOND_OF_MINUTE.adjustInto(ChronoField.NANO_OF_SECOND.adjustInto(temporal, 0), 0), 0);
027  private static final TemporalAdjuster DAY_ADJUSTER = (temporal) -> ChronoField.HOUR_OF_DAY.adjustInto(temporal.with(HOUR_ADJUSTER), 0);
028  private static final TemporalAdjuster WEEK_ADJUSTER = (temporal) -> ChronoField.DAY_OF_WEEK.adjustInto(temporal.with(DAY_ADJUSTER), 1);
029  private static final long SECONDS_PER_HOUR = Duration.ofHours(1).getSeconds();
030  private static final long SECONDS_PER_DAY = Duration.ofDays(1).getSeconds();
031  private static final long SECONDS_PER_WEEK = Duration.ofDays(7).getSeconds();
032
033  @Embedded
034  private Student student;
035  @Relation(parentColumn = "student_id", entityColumn = "student_id")
036  private List<ZoomMeeting> zoomMeetings;
037
038  public SortedMap<LocalDateTime, Long> getAggregates(ChronoUnit unit) {
039    SortedMap<LocalDateTime, Long> aggregates = new TreeMap<>();
040
041
042    List<ZoomMeeting> zoomMeetings = getZoomMeetings();
043
044    zoomMeetings.stream()
045        .flatMap(meeting -> {
046          TemporalAdjuster adjuster = switch (unit) {
047            case HOURS -> HOUR_ADJUSTER;
048            case DAYS -> DAY_ADJUSTER;
049            case WEEKS -> WEEK_ADJUSTER;
050            default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException();
051          };
052          long bucketSize = switch (unit) {
053            case HOURS -> SECONDS_PER_HOUR;
054            case DAYS -> SECONDS_PER_DAY;
055            case WEEKS -> SECONDS_PER_WEEK;
056            default -> 0;
057          };
058          LocalDateTime baseline = LocalDateTime.ofInstant(meeting.getStarted(), ZoneId.systemDefault()).with(adjuster);
059          return IntStream.iterate(0, (value) -> value + 1)
060              .mapToObj(value -> baseline.plusSeconds(value * bucketSize))
061              .map((start) -> {
062                Instant startingInstant = start.toInstant(ZoneId.systemDefault().getRules()
063                    .getOffset(start));
064                ZoomMeeting slice = new ZoomMeeting();
065                slice.setStarted(start.toInstant(ZoneId.systemDefault().getRules().getOffset(start)));
066                long duration = (meeting.getStarted().compareTo(startingInstant) > 0)
067                    ? startingInstant.plusSeconds(bucketSize).getEpochSecond() - meeting.getStarted().getEpochSecond()
068                    : bucketSize;
069                if (startingInstant.plusSeconds(bucketSize).compareTo(meeting.getStarted().plusSeconds(meeting.getDuration())) > 0) {
070                  duration -= startingInstant.plusSeconds(bucketSize).getEpochSecond() - meeting.getStarted().plusSeconds(meeting.getDuration()).getEpochSecond();
071                }
072                slice.setDuration(duration);
073                return slice;
074              });
075        })
076        .forEach(meeting -> {
077          LocalDateTime key = LocalDateTime.ofInstant(meeting.getStarted(), ZoneId.systemDefault());
078          aggregates.put(key, aggregates.getOrDefault(key, 0L) + meeting.getDuration());
079
080        });
081    return aggregates;
082
083//    return new TreeMap<>(aggregates);
084
085  }
086
087  public Student getStudent() {
088    return student;
089  }
090
091  public void setStudent(Student student) {
092    this.student = student;
093  }
094
095  public List<ZoomMeeting> getZoomMeetings() {
096    return zoomMeetings;
097  }
098
099  public void setZoomMeetings(
100      List<ZoomMeeting> zoomMeetings) {
101    this.zoomMeetings = zoomMeetings;
102  }
103}
